title: The YouTubers are freaked
description:
YouTube is finally being forced to follow a decades-old rule that protects kids’ privacy online. What does this mean for content creators?

Featured Guests
@kellymakena

LINKS:
Makena Kelly’s done a lot of COPPA coverage. Here’s her article from the original FTC announcement, and more about the possibility of an eraser button going forward.
 
The Goods by Vox did a deep dive on Ryan’s World last year. 

We drew a lot from this video by The Game Theorists, if you’re inclined to watch it yourself.

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
